SCTX - Script Source:
ScriptName fbmwILAdvancementQuestScript


; For the purposes of determining Skills in this Script, the Secondary Skills are ignored.  They are a joke and not worth the added complexity

; 0 = Recruit									    0 LegionReputation,	Personality 30, Endurance 30
; 1 = Spearman								    5 LegionReputation,	Personality 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 10
; 2 = Trooper								  10 LegionReputation,	Personality 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 20
; 3 = Agent	 								 20 LegionReputation,	Personality 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 30 + Two Skills at   5
; 4 = Champion								  30 LegionReputation,	Personality 30, Endurance 30, One Skill at 40 + Two Skills at 10
; 5 = Knight Errant							  45 LegionReputation,	Personality 31, Endurance 31, One Skill at 50 + Two Skills at 15
; 6 = Knight Bachelor						  60 LegionReputation,	Personality 32, Endurance 32, One Skill at 60 + Two Skills at 20
; 7 = Knight Protector						  70 LegionReputation,	Personality 33, Endurance 33, One Skill at 70 + Two Skills at 25
; 8 = Knight of the Garland				  80 LegionReputation,	Personality 34, Endurance 34, One Skill at 80 + Two Skills at 30
; 9 = Knight of the Imperial Dragon	100 LegionReputation,	Personality 35, Endurance 35, One Skill at 90 + Two Skills at 35

; Legion = Athletics, Blade, Block, Blunt, HeavyArmor, Marksman

SHORT LegionAdvancement
; 0 = Nothing Qualifies
; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not
; 3 = Qualified For Advancement
; 4 = Script Needs To Set Next Rank
; 5 = No More Advancement

SHORT LegionReputation

SHORT QualifyReputation
SHORT QualifySkills

short ExpelledOnce

float fQuestDelayTime

BEGIN GameMode

	if (fQuestDelayTime != 0.5)
		set fQuestDelayTime to 0.5
	endif
	
	if PlayerInMorrowind == 0
		return	;there really is no need to run this in Cyrodiil
	endif

	If Player.GetInFaction 0ImperialSLegion == 0
		return
	endif

;This part of the script handles expulsion

	If Player.GetInFaction 0ImperialSLegion
		If GetPCFactionSteal 0ImperialSLegion
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0ImperialSLegion)
				SetPCExpelled 0ImperialSLegion 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Imperial Legion."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionSteal 0ImperialSLegion 0
			endif
		EndIf

		If GetPCFactionAttack 0ImperialSLegion
			if eval (Call mwGetFactionWitnessesFunc 0ImperialSLegion)
				SetPCExpelled 0ImperialSLegion 1
				MessageBox "You have been expelled from Imperial Legion."
				AddTopic 1makeSamends
			else
				SetPCFactionAttack 0ImperialSLegion 0
			endif
		EndIf

	EndIf

;The rest of the script below handles skill checks and advancement

	SET QualifyReputation TO 0
	SET QualifySkills TO 0

	IF LegionAdvancement == 4 ; Need To Set Next Rank
		IF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 10
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 11
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 20
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 21
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 30
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 31
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 40
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 41
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 50
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 51
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 60
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 61
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 70
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 71
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 80
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 81
		ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement == 90
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 91
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 5
			RETURN
		ENDIF

		SET LegionAdvancement TO 0
; Continue processing to see if player can advance multilpe ranks
;		RETURN
	ENDIF ; LegionAdvancement == 4

	IF LegionAdvancement == 3 || LegionAdvancement == 5
		RETURN
	ENDIF



	IF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 10 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 0
		IF LegionReputation >= 5
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 10 || Player.GetAV Block >= 10 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 10 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 10 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 10
			SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
		ENDIF

		IF QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 10
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 20 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 1
		IF LegionReputation >= 10
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 20 || Player.GetAV Block >= 20 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 20 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 20 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 20
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 20
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 30 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 2
		IF LegionReputation >= 20
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 30 || Player.GetAV Block >= 30 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 30 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 30 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 30
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 30
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 40 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 3
		IF LegionReputation >= 30
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 30 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 30
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 40 || Player.GetAV Block >= 40 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 40 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 40 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 40
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 40
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 50 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 4
		IF LegionReputation >= 45
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 31 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 31
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 50 || Player.GetAV Block >= 50 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 50 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 50 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 50
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 50
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 60 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 5
		IF LegionReputation >= 60
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 32 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 32
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 60 || Player.GetAV Block >= 60 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 60 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 60 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 60
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 60
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 70 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 6
		IF LegionReputation >= 70
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 33 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 33
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 70 || Player.GetAV Block >= 70 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 70 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 70 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 70
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 70
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 80 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 7
		IF LegionReputation >= 80
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 34 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 34
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 80 || Player.GetAV Block >= 80 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 80 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 80 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 80
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 80
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ELSEIF GetStage fbmwILAdvancement < 90 && Player.GetFactionRank 0ImperialSLegion == 8
		IF LegionReputation >= 100
			SET QualifyReputation TO 1 ; Reputation Qualifies
		ENDIF

		IF Player.GetAV Personality >= 35 && Player.GetAV Endurance >= 35
			IF Player.GetAV Athletics >= 90 || Player.GetAV Block >= 90 || Player.GetAV HeavyArmor >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blade >= 90 || Player.GetAV Blunt >= 90 || Player.GetAV Marksman >= 90
				SET QualifySkills TO 1 ; Skills Qualify
			ENDIF
		ENDIF

		IF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 1
			SetStage fbmwILAdvancement 90
			SET LegionAdvancement TO 3
			AddTopic 1Advancement
		ENDIF

	ENDIF


; 1 = Skills Qualify; Reputation Does Not
; 2 = Reputation Qualifies, but Skills do Not

	IF QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET LegionAdvancement TO 0
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 1 && QualifyReputation == 0
		SET LegionAdvancement TO 1
	ELSEIF  QualifySkills == 0 && QualifyReputation == 1
		SET LegionAdvancement TO 2
	ENDIF
END ; GameMode
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 3564 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>

CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
CD CD CD CD CD CD CD
